title: Kadhal Oru Pallikoodam Lyrics Aasai Aasaiyaai
stanzas: <div>Kadhal Oru Pallikoodam Lyrics Aasai Aasaiyaai

Kadhal, Oru pallikoodam
kangal, adhil paadamaagum
kattraal, adhu vedhamaagum
neeyum kadhal sei.

kadhal, nam sondha swaasam
kadhal, nam aanma thaagam
kadhal, nam raththa ottam
neeyum kadhal sei.

ulagathin jeeva sakthi
pasi kadhal rendum thaan.
pasi kooda theerndhu pogum
theeraadhu kadhal thaan.

nee kadhal seiga
un jenmam velga.
nee kadhal seiga, aaga
nam kadhal vazhga.

Kadhal, Oru pallikoodam
kangal, adhil paadamaagum
kattraal, adhu vedhamaagum
neeyum kadhal sei.(2)

neeyum kadhal sei.

uyir thandha, udal thandha
un petrorai kadhal sei.
mozhi thandha, vazhi thandha
un guruvai nee kadhal sei.

oru neram pasi thandha
un suttram ne kadhal sei.
uyir thandhu uyir kaakkum
un natpai nee kadhal sei.

megam ennum oru thaayil
.. siru minnal.
adhai kadhla sei.

boomi enum pon kattil
veli kaasaai vizhum
mazhaiyai nee kadhal sei.

udhirndhu udhirndhu pinnum
malarndhu malarndhu
vandhu mulaikkum kozhundhinai
adhal sei.

kuraindhu kuraindhu thinam
karaindhu karaindhu pinnum
valarum pirayai nee kadhal sei.

kangal, adhil paadamaagum

neeyum kadhal sei.

kadhal, nam sondha swaasam
kadhal, nam aanma thaagam
kadhal, nam raththa ottam
neeyum kadhal sei.

Parundhodu siru kozhi
prandhadikkuthe andha
kobathai kadhal seiga.

nizhal neetta marakoottam
veyil thaanguthe, adha
thiyagathai kadhal seiga.

arivoottidum un varumaiyai
nee kadhal sei.
adhai neekkidum un
thiramaiyai ne kadhal sei.

[naadu kaadu engum
narambai pola varum
nadhigalai kadhal seiga.

annai eendravudam
nammai yendhi konda
mannai kadhal seiga.] (2)

dhesiya kodiyai kadhal sei.
